page.title: 15My Street in Dumfries
page.content:
My name is Caroline Murphy and I live at Hermitage Crescent. I really like living here because I have quite a lot of friends. We hardly ever fall out, and all our parents are friends and they hardly fall out either.
In our Crescent there is a big round grass lawn. It is brilliant for playing football, rugby, cricket and to make up a BMX cycle course. It is wonderful in winter, when it snows heavily, to have snowball fights. But the best thing about playing here is that only one or two cars come in each day.
